title: Buy Equitas Small Finance Bank; target of Rs 80: Emkay Global Financial - Moneycontrol
content: Buy Equitas Small Finance Bank; target of Rs 80: Emkay Global Financial  Moneycontrol
description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Equitas Small Finance Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 80 in its research report dated March 22, 2022.
